title: BRIEF-Dampier Gold Enters Into JV Agreement With Torian Resources
text:
BRIEF-Dampier Gold Enters Into JV Agreement With Torian Resources

Commodities 48 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 18:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Dampier Gold Enters Into JV Agreement With Torian Resources Oct 4 (Reuters) - Dampier Gold Ltd : * ENTERED INTO BINDING JOINT VENTURE TERM SHEETS WITH TORIAN RESOURCES LIMITED ON ZULEIKA GOLD PROJECT AND CREDO WELL GOLD PROJECT * DAMPIER HAS RIGHT TO EARN UP TO A 75% INTEREST IN ZULEIKA PROJECT BY SPENDING A TOTAL OF $4.0M OVER 4 YEARS * DAMPIER HAS RIGHT TO EARN UP TO A 50% INTEREST IN CREDO WELL PROJECT BY SPENDING A TOTAL OF $2.0M OVER 4 YEARS * INTENDS TO UNDERTAKE A CAPITAL RAISING IN AN AMOUNT OF UP TO $2.5 MILLION

BRIEF-Dampier Gold Enters Into JV Agreement With Torian Resources
description: BRIEF-Dampier Gold Enters Into JV Agreement With Torian Resources
